meanings.definition: A plant belonging to the class Dicotyledonae, characterized by having two seed leaves.
meanings.sent1: Dicots are plants with two seed leaves.
meanings.sent2: I learned in school that dicots are a type of plant with two seed leaves.
meanings.sent3: The dicots at the garden party were the first to sprout.
meanings.sent4: In the field of botany, dicots stand out like twins among plants.
meanings.sent5: The farmer carefully nurtured the dicots, knowing they would grow into beautiful flowers.

meanings.definition: The group of flowering plants that have two seed leaves.
meanings.sent1: Dicots are a diverse group of flowering plants.
meanings.sent2: Gardens often include dicots for their colorful blooms.
meanings.sent3: The dicots in the garden chatted happily with the monocots.
meanings.sent4: In the world of flora, dicots are like the vibrant dancers at a botanical ball.
meanings.sent5: The field guide helped me identify the dicots by their distinct leaves.
